alert.note: Alert for Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 7:14PM EST until December 24 at 2:34AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Williams River At Rockingham. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM EST Friday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 5.7 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.4 feet on 04/22/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Williams River Rockingham Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Fri 6 pm: 8.4 Forecast: Fri 7 pm MSG Sat 1 am 7.0 Sat 7 am 6.5 Sat 1 pm 6.1 Sat 7 pm 5.7 Sun 1 am MSG Sun 7 am MSG Sun 1 pm MSG Sun 7 pm MSG Mon 1 am MSG Mon 7 am MSG Mon 1 pm MSG &&
